name: Ensure
0:
”Alexa, Open Ensure”
”Alexa, ask Ensure to get the tip of the day”
”Alexa, ask Ensure to find the best product for me”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ensure
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to the new Ensure Skill for Amazon Alexa. We're here to support you on your health and wellness journey. 
 
Just say 'Alexa, open Ensure' to get:

 • Nutrition advice, including info on a free nutrition assessment, how nutrition impacts recovery from illness or injury, and simple concepts for good nutrition
 • Caregiver advice, including info on free resources, getting the most out of doctor visits, and getting started in one of the toughest and most important jobs there is
 • Help finding the right Ensure product for your nutritional goals

You can also sign up for daily tips on nutrition, caregiving, exercise, and recipes! Just say "Alexa, tell me the Ensure tip of the day".

Discussion of medical and health topics should never be construed as medical advice. You are advised to contact a healthcare professional in your area if you need medical advice. Abbott does not represent that the information on Abbott’s channels is accurate, complete, reliable, useful, timely or current. You read all content at your own risk. Do not rely on the information or advice in any of these postings. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
